header.title: PDFBox - Java PDF Library
header.meta: Java PDF Library, pdfbox, pdftotext, print pdf

section.title: Introduction
section.p: PDFBox is an open source Java PDF library for working with PDF documents. This project allows creation of new PDF documents, manipulation of existing documents and the ability to extract content from documents. PDFBox also includes several command line utilities.

ul.li: Fill in form data FDF and XFDF
Create a PDF from a text file
